price: the Day when the Trumpet will be blown; on that Day We will gather together the wicked sightless[35] [from horror].
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا
footnotes: [35] i.e., blind, blue-eyed, blue-faced out of terror.
